original_text: and carried off all the treasures of the house of the Lord and the treasures of the king's house, and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold in the temple of the Lord, which Solomon king of Israel had made, as the Lord had foretold.
korean_text: 그가 여호와의 성전의 모든 보물과 왕궁 보물을 집어내고 또 이스라엘의 왕 솔로몬이 만든 것 곧 여호와의 성전의 금 그릇을 다 파괴하였으니 여호와의 말씀과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: and carried off all the treasures of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호와의 집 모든 보물을 가져가고

sentences.original_text: and the treasures of the king's house
and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold
in the temple of the Lord
which Solomon king of Israel had made
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 이스라엘 왕 솔로몬이 만든 것이었는데
